timeline.message:
Add support for ByteBufferAttributeConverter

Add support ByteBuffer as an an attribute type.
The DynamoDBType already lists it as a standard type.

Add support for ByteBufferAttributeConverter

Add support ByteBuffer as an an attribute type.
The DynamoDBType already lists it as a standard type.

timeline.author: joviegas

replies.bodyText:
Hi @joviegas ,
updated, thanks for preparing this so well.
